title: STAT+: OpenAI invites you to upload medical records to ChatGPT
description: In this edition of STAT Health Tech: FDA's deregulatory push on AI and wearables, OpenAI announces ChatGPT Health, and more.
content: In this edition of STAT Health Tech: FDA's deregulatory push on AI and wearables, OpenAI announces ChatGPT Health, and more.
